description: All image viewers i've ever seen have something on screen other than the image they're displaying. I didn't like that, so, pViewer was born. And that's why everything in pViewer is done with the right click menu and keyboard shortcuts. I also didn't want to use two different viewers for viewing images and for reading comics, and that's why pViewer have a Manga/Comic mode.
summary: pViewer, a small and fast image viewer. Because less is more.
author: Phate
